course_title: Seminar in Art and Architecture: Urbs Aeterna:Art & Architecture Ancient Rome
class_notes: Study Abroad. Course meets abroad from May 15 - June 4, 2023. Apply online at www.studyabroad.emory.edu
course_description: Art and architecture studied on site, in locations other than Atlanta, in Europe, the Americas, Asia, or the African continent. May be repeated for credit when topic varies.
